Class Shirt

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shirt

  • public class Shirt
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstraction of a real-life shirt

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Shirt(char colour, double price)
      Create a Shirt Object with a specific colour (R, G or B), price, and default brand ("waterBrand")
      Shirt(char colour, double price, java.lang.String brand)
      Create a Shirt Object with a specific colour, price and brand

    • Method Summary

      Set the colour of the shirt

      Set the price of the shirt
      java.lang.String toString()
